title: Testing and Evaluation of Health Care Applications of Large Language Models: A Systematic Review
details: S Bedi, Y Liu, L Orr-Ewing, D Dash, S Koyejo… - JAMA
abstract: Importance Large language models (LLMs) can assist in various health care activities, but current evaluation approaches may not adequately identify the most useful application areas. Objective To summarize existing evaluations of LLMs in …
